structure.unit: ARTICLE XII. PUBLIC AND BUS PASSENGER BENCHES AND SHELTERS

text.section:
Sec. 21-151. Definitions.
Director means the Director of Miami-Dade Transit Agency.
Department means the Miami-Dade Transit Agency.
MDTA means Miami-Dade Transit Agency.
Permittee means an individual, firm, partnership, or corporation, or combination thereof who has entered into a contract with the County to provide bus benches at authorized MDTA bus stops.
Bus stop means a location designated by MDTA for buses to stop for the purpose of loading and unloading passengers.
Right-of-way means any right, title or interest in or to real property, or the use thereof acquired by the County or the State of Florida or the public and utilized for passage or travel including MDTA authorized bus stops.
